word:
Shall not the ministers of God go into these crowded centers, as Portland, as Baltimore, and there lift up their voices in warning to multitudes? What are our conferences for, if not for the carrying forward of this very work? At such a time as this, every hand is to be employed. New 


                                    -322- 

York City and all our cities are to be worked. The Lord is coming. The end is near; yea, it hasteth greatly.--Ms 53, 1909, p. 5. ("Proclaiming the Third Angel's Message in Cities at Home and Abroad," June 11, 1909.)
